definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: mound, hill, only as acropolis;—´[[ע]] abs. 2Ki 5:24 +, cstr. Mic 4:8; —fortified mound or hill within city, or Jerus. (cf. Rob:BR i. 267 Gu:ZPV v (1882), 326) Mic 4:8 Is 32:14; S. end of eastern hill Ne 3:26, Ne 11:21, 2Ch 33:14 ´[[חוֹמַת הָע]] Ne 3:27, 2Ch 27:3 (cf. [[חמת העפל]] in [[קרחה]] MI:21. 22); of Samaria 2Ki 5:24.
